title: [Mega Tracking] - Align spec to release v0.6
body:
This PR tracks the overall progress of aligning current beacon chain implementation to spec version 0.6. Please comment on the issue before you pick up an item to work on. 

- [x] ðŸ’Ž  **Update [constant](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#constants) names and values** ðŸ’Ž
- [x] ðŸ’Ž  **Update Protobuf data structures** ðŸ’Ž
    - [x] Update [Crosslink](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#crosslink) | #2313
    - [x] Update [Eth1Data](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#eth1data) | #2315
    - [x] Update [AttestationData](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#attestationdata) | #2316

    - [x] Update [IndexedAttestation](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#indexedattestation) | #2316

    - [x] Update [BeaconBlockHeader](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#beaconblockheader) | #2327
    - [x] Update [Validator](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#validator) | #2318
    - [x] Update [HistoricalBatch](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#historicalbatch) | #2327
    - [x] Update [ProposerSlashing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#proposerslashing) | #2328

    - [x] Update [BeaconBlockBody](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#BeaconBlockBody) | #2340

- [x] ðŸ’Ž  **Update general [helper functions](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#helperfunctions)**  ðŸ’Ž
    - [x] Update slot related helpers | #2345

- [x] ðŸ’Ž  **Update routines for [changing validator status](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#routines-for-updating-validator-status)****  ðŸ’Ž
    - [x] Update initiate validator exit | #2366 
    - [x] Update slash validator (relies on balance and BeaconProposerIndex changes) | #2391

- [x] ðŸ’Ž  **Verify and update [chain start logic](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#eth2genesis-log)**  ðŸ’Ž
    - [x] Update [genesis functions](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#on-genesis) | #2465 
    - [x] Update Deposit Contract to new spec.

- [x] ðŸ’Ž  **Verify and update [SSZ](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/simple-serialize.md)** ðŸ’Ž 
    - [x] ðŸ”¹ Implement [self-signed containers](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/simple-serialize.md#self-signed-containers)ðŸ”¹

- [x] ðŸ’Ž  **Update beacon chain [state transition function](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#beacon-chain-state-transition-function)**  ðŸ’Ž
    - [x] ðŸ”¹ Update [per epoch processing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#per-epoch-processing)ðŸ”¹
        - [x] Update [general helper functions](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#helper-functions-1) | #2379
        - [x] Update [justification and finalization functions](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#justification-and-finalization) | #2448
        - [x] Update [crosslink function](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#crosslinks) | #2460 
        - [x] Update [rewards and penalties functions](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#rewards-and-penalties) | #2517
        - [x] Update [registry updates functions](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#registry-updates) | #2521
        - [x] Update [slashings function](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#slashings)
        - [x] Update [final updates functions](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#final-updates)
    - [x]  ðŸ”¹ Update [per slot processing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#per-slot-processing)ðŸ”¹
    - [x]  ðŸ”¹ Update [per block processing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#per-block-processing)ðŸ”¹
        - [x] Implement [process block header](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#block-header) | #2534
        - [x] Update [process randao](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#randao) | #2614
        - [x] Update [process eth1 data](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#eth1-data)
        - [x] Update [proposer slashing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#proposer-slashings) | #2603
        - [x] Update [attester slashing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#attester-slashings)

        - [x] Update [deposits processing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#deposits)
        - [x] Update [exits processing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#voluntary-exits)
        - [x] Implement [transfers processing](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#transfers)
        - [x] Update [state root verification](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#state-root-verification)


- [x] ðŸ’Ž  **Verify and update [BLS](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/bls_signature.md#bls-signature-verification)
     - [x] ðŸ”¹  add [bls verify](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/bls_signature.md#bls_verify)

- [x] align RPC endpoint [eth1data to spec](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/validator/0_beacon-chain-validator.md#eth1-data) | #2733

Discussed offline that we should not break master, but it is acceptable to break a [spec-v0.6](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/tree/spec-v0.6) working branch so that [spec-v0.6](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/tree/spec-v0.6) can be reviewed in pieces then reviewed once more in a merge to master. 

Please submit all PRs to branch [spec-v0.6](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/tree/spec-v0.6)

~Working on updating protofields for [Crosslink](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0) and [Eth1Data](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/core/0_beacon-chain.md#eth1data)~

done

Working on removing genesisSlot/genesisEpoch

please review proto changes in following order:
#2315, #2316, #2318, #2327, #2338, #2340 and #2341
